1.title: This Is My Crazy Family

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

1.plot: Six-year-old pageant superstar Alana, aka Honey Boo Boo takes us off the pageant stage and into her home with her family. It's summertime in Georgia and that means one thing - mud. The whole family heads to the Summer Redneck Games to get down and dirty.

2.title: Gonna Be a Glitz Pig

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

2.plot: To cheer Alana up after she loses a pageant, Sugar Bear brings home a pet pig named Glitzy.

3.title: She Oooo'd Herself

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

3.plot: The big pageant is only a few weeks away so June puts her money-saving skills to the test to save for Alana's pageant fees. Alana meets with a new pageant coach and learns her hardest routine yet. Then, the whole family throws Chickadee a baby shower.

4.title: I'm Sassified!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

4.plot: Sugar Bear takes June out for a romantic anniversary dinner, and Alanna talks the girls into helping her decorate by TP-ing the house.

5.title: What Is a Door Nut?

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

5.plot: The family gets ready for Christmas in July to collect food and toys for poor families, and Chickadee goes into early labor.

6.title: A Bunch of Wedgies

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

6.plot: After a trip to the ER, pregnant Anna returns home with strict orders to take it easy. As the summer weight loss challenge draws to a close, June and the girls face their final weigh-in. Then, Alana and the family travel to the Rock Star Divas Pageant.

7.title: Shh! It's a Wig

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

7.plot: The family goes to a wig store to find a new wig for Alana's pageant getup. Sugar Bear takes the family out to a BBQ restaurant.

8.title: Time for a Sketti!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

8.plot: Sugar Bear takes Alana out to an arcade for a father/daughter play date. June prepares a spaghetti dinner for the family.

9.title: Ah-choo!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

9.plot: Alana's 7th birthday party comes complete with a barbecue, inflatable slides, and presents her sisters rounded up from June's stockpile room.

10.title: It Is What It Is

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

10.plot: Anna 'Chickadee' finally gives birth to her daughter, Kaitlyn. Uncle Poodle comes to help Alana prepare for a new pageant, and Sugar Bear presents a surprise for Alana during the competition.

11.title: A Very Boo Halloween

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

11.plot: In this "Holladay" special see what Honey Boo Boo and her family do for Christmas, Thanksgiving and Halloween.

12.title: A Very Boo Thanksgiving

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

12.plot: Alana and her family get ready for Thanksgiving. Pumpkin is put on bed rest after getting hit in the eye with a set of keys. June attempts to cook a Thanksgiving turkey for the first time.

13.title: You Don't Know Boo!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

13.plot: Come back down South for more sassy attitudes and crazy family fun on this special episode. Alana and her family gather to share the most redneckognizeable moments from the series as well as never-before-seen moments and behind the scenes laughs!

14.title: A Very Boo Christmas

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

14.plot: Honey Boo Boo and the family get in the Christmas spirit as they gear up for their annual Christmas display and charity drive. Penny-pinching June takes the family to the flea market to find Christmas deals and also teaches them the joy of re-gifting.

1.title: Mo' Butter, Mo' Better

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

1.plot: June watches Baby Kaitlyn while Anna is back in school. The family attends wrestling where Sugar Bear worked security and introduce their own wrestling move: the cup-a-fart. When June takes the girls' cell phones away, they retaliate by using butter and cooking oil for a redneck slip n' slide in the kitchen.

2.title: Turn This Big Mama On

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

2.plot: Mama and the girls try to plan a surprise birthday party for Sugar Bear and make it a Dukes of Hazzard themed-party, and go go-karting. Sugar Bear sends the girls away for alone time with June.

3.title: It's Always Something with Pumpkin

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

3.plot: For Pumpkin's 13th birthday, after letting her think it would be a boring dinner at home, they go to a restaurant where Pumpkin and Sugar Bear take on the Pigzilla challenge to eat a 4-pound sandwich in 45 minutes for a chance to win $200. Pumpkin is the youngest person and only girl to date to take on the challenge.

4.title: The 'M' Word

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

4.plot: Sugar Bear plans to propose to June for the 3rd time and enlists the girls' help in picking out a ring and making a romantic dinner.

5.title: Chubby Chaser

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

5.plot: June is scared of getting married because her family is full of divorces, but she agrees to do a commitment ceremony with Sugar Bear, and everybody gets excited planning for the 'wedding'.

6.title: Safety!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

6.plot: June and Pumpkin decide to try and lose weight to fit into their dresses for the commitment ceremony. June tries to inspire all the girls to exercise. Sugar Bear is rushed to the hospital and is diagnosed with pneumonia and pancreatitis. June tries to hold it together and stay positive for the girls without letting on how bad Sugar Bear is.

7.title: Runaway Bride!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

7.plot: While June makes daily trips out to the hospital be with Sugar Bear, Chubbs steps in as a mini-Mama and keeps the house in order. The girls plan a bridal shower for June to take her mind off Sugar Bear's hospitalization. Sugar Bear comes home from the hospital but is still recovering.

8.title: Big Girls Wear Lace-Ups

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

8.plot: The DIY Bride is checking things off her to-do list, but June is not accustomed to this much planning and her stress level is getting high. Alana and the girls ask about their first dance and suggest that Sugar Bear and June seek professional help.

9.title: Get Her Chins Vacuumed

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

9.plot: Sugar Bear is nervous before the ceremony, especially once he realizes he doesn't have a thing to wear! He brings the girls with him to shop for a tuxedo.Mama June gets a spa day to relax and most importantly, get her chins vacuumed!

10.title: Lift and Scoop

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

10.plot: June goes shopping for a proper-fitting bra. Then the party starts when both Sugar Bear and June let loose at their Bachelor and Bachelorette parties. One is a quiet affair, while the other takes a lap dance on the wild side!

11.title: Stress Poops

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

11.plot: All the anxiety and stress from the ceremony planning has Mama stuck in the bathroom! The girls have a meeting to go over the to-do list while Sugar Bear and June meet with who they hope will be their Redneck Preacher.

12.title: Happily Ever After?

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

12.plot: The ceremony is finally here and with all the rain and chaos June is a bundle of stress! On the big day, the girls get beautimous while Sugar Bear gets dressed up in his camo tuxedo. Will the bride make her way down the aisle?

1.title: The Manper

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

1.plot: Sugar Bear decides he needs some man space so he gets a Man Camper, or Manper. While Sugar Bear enjoys his Manper, Pumpkin primps the girls with waxing and blackhead removal. But the family reunites for a trip to the Redneck Games.

2.title: The Birds and the Boos

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

2.plot: Anna and Jessica have boyfriends, and June is not ready to be a Grandmother (again). June and Sugar Bear each have painfully awkward sex talks with the older girls and their boyfriends. Meanwhile, Alana is feeling left out and needs a new hobby.

3.title: Familymoon

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

3.plot: June and Sugar Bear never had a honeymoon after their Commitment Ceremony, so they decide to make it a family affair and go on a Familymoon. Their RV journey includes an Animal Safari, encountering the wild animals, a Children's museum, and a candy shop.

4.title: Hubba Bubba!

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

4.plot: The RV Familymoon continues as they head to the ocean for the girls' first surf lesson. Sugar Bear puts the Honey back in Familymoon taking June away for some alone time. Before heading home, the family enjoys a real Southern meal... ordering everything!

5.title: Get a Job

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

5.plot: The girls want to get a pool for the garden but June tells them to pay for it themselves by getting jobs for the summer. The girls want to go on dates with their boyfriends but June insists that the rest of the family are going too.

6.title: Funk Shway

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

6.plot: The house is bursting at the seams and it's time to consider moving. June asks the family for their new house wish-list. The family also enjoys some summer fun at the Blueberry Festival, where Alana competes in a blueberry pie-eating contest.

7.title: Monkeys Make Very Good Brothers

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

7.plot: After failing to "swoo" June in the bedroom, Sugar Bear suggests couples' therapy, which June warily agrees to. While the folks are dealing with relationship stuff, the girls amuse themselves with ice blocking and exploding soda bottles.

8.title: Stand Peein' Up

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

8.plot: The girls are spending their summer vacation in bed, so Sugar Bear decides the family really needs some time in the outdoors. The girls are not happy, refusing to load up their camping gear and then crying when their electronic devices are taken away.

9.title: Can I Say *****?

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

9.plot: The girls have developed potty mouths, so the family sets up a swear jar. Meanwhile, Anna thinks she wants to go to culinary school, so her family dares her to make a chicken pot pie. Fortunately, Alana enjoys handling raw chicken and is able to assist.

10.title: You Need Your Thumb to Vacuum Clean

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

10.plot: It's Kaitlyn's 1st Birthday! Anna is faced with the difficult decision of whether or not to have Kaitlyn's third thumb removed. Alana has been feeling left out since Kaitlyn became the baby of the house, so June takes her out for some bonding time.

11.title: Sherlock Poop

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

11.plot: When one of the family doesn't flush the toilet, Alana turns detective to find the poopster. Sugar Bear thinks June needs to be re-hornified. There's a shock for June when she finds an ad for accommodation to let.

12.title: You're Be Nineteen

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

12.plot: June gets a shock when her period is late. Is she pregnant? It's Anna & Alana's birthday and the family go for a fun day out but someone doesn't turn up. June is in turmoil when Anna still insists on moving out of the family home.

13.title: Halloween Too

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

13.plot: It's Halloween in the Shannon house and that means plenty of pranks on each other. The family volunteer at the local Haunted House fair.

14.title: Never Boo-fore Seen

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

14.plot: Alana presents her favorite out-takes, behind the scenes footage and deleted scenes from the series.

15.title: New Year's Revolutions

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

15.plot: With just a week to go until New Year's Eve, the family haven't completed any of their resolutions for the year. So they try and do them. Will June conquer her Mayonaise fear? Anna is asked an important question. Will she say yes?

1.title: 3 Generations & 1 Pork Rind

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

1.plot: Even a life-size Mario Lopez cut-out can't boost birthday girl June's spirits as she's copes with an empty-nest when Anna and Kaitlyn decide to move out. Extra time allows her to work at the bakery, leaving Sugar Bear alone to become a domestic housewife.

2.title: Yodega

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

2.plot: June's "b*tching" and nagging lands Sugar Bear sick in bed from stress. Will June have to permanently alter what comes out of her mouth to keep her man healthy? Or will Sugar Bear's de-stressing techniques like "yodega" and racing be more beneficial?

3.title: Bingo Face

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

3.plot: June's love of couponing takes over, leaving Sugar Bear looking for ways to exploit her addiction for affection. The sisters try being affectionate too, as a new "be nice" contest has high stakes: the spare room. Little do they know the contest is rigged.

4.title: Top 10 Summer Moments

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Forced Family Fun

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

5.plot: Without Anna and Kaitlyn around, the family spends very little time together. Alana hopes the family's love for food will reunite them, but her efforts fall just as short as family game night and pottery painting. The family's last hope lies in the mud.

6.title: Civil War

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

6.plot: Anna's dreams of an flashy wedding come to a halt as June joins the couple to a potential venue. Sugar Bear hunts for riches in the yard courtesy of a metal detector and Alana. Expecting only coins, they're shocked to learn what they've uncovered.

7.title: Vowel of Silence

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

7.plot: With no critters to play with, June rents Alana a goat from a farm. Unlike Alana, Sugar Bear's been feeling the love and buys some personal items for him and June to use in private. To keep the house quiet, he offers Jessica and Pumpkin money to hush up.

8.title: Brain Rest

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

8.plot: The family is in a car accident and Pumpkin has to stay at the hospital with June by her side. Back home, Sugar Bear, Jessica and Alana miss Pumpkin but still revel in their freedom without Mama around. Anna and Michael get matching tattoos.

9.title: This Couch Is on Fire

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

9.plot: June and Sugar Bear decide it's time for some home improvement. The girls repaint their "doo-doo" colored walls, June agrees to some face improvements by waxing her beard situation, and the family says "goodbye" to their old couch.

10.title: Spring Broken

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

10.plot: It's Spring break and the girls are bored. After making a "redneck hot tub" in the back of a pickup truck, June and Sugar Bear take the family away to a houseboat vacation and invite Anna, Michael, and Kaitlyn to join in on some quality family time.

11.title: Girl Power

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

11.plot: Jessica broke up with her boyfriend, so she and her best girlfriend Carle decide they will be each other's Prom date. Tensions rise between Anna and June over the wedding details. The family also throws Anna a surprise wrestling themed wedding shower.

12.title: Trouble in Paradise

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

12.plot: The girls think Sugar Bear and Mama June's love needs some shakin' up. An anniversary couples massage does the trick in more ways than one. Anna's wedding nears as the bridesmaids dress sizes cause drama, but Anna's about to drop an even bigger bomb.

13.title: Ain't Gonna Leave Me

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

13.plot: Wedding prep increases and June tries to take control of the final decoration plans. Sugar Bear and pals take Michael fishing to initiate him into manhood, but only after he and Alana give taxidermy a try. A final picnic leaves June holding onto Anna.

14.title: Annabama

episode of.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo (TV Series 2012–2017)

14.plot: June's control over Anna's wedding boils over only days before the big day. A quirky party distracts Anna, but leads to a bit of awkwardness. The long-awaited wedding is only the prelude though, as the new family packs up and kisses Georgia goodbye.

imdb.plot outline: Alana and her mother, June, have been become two of the more familiar Toddlers & Tiaras faces after a 2012 episode showed Alana drinking go-go juice before a competition. The drink, which worked her into a frenzy in front of the cameras, is a combination of Red Bull and Mountain Dew and had the pair working the talk show circuit earlier in the year to defend their caffeine consumption. Nicknamed Honey Boo Boo, Alana and her family, mother June, dad Sugar Bear and sisters Lauryn, Jessica and Anna, will be the focus of the series when the youngest daughter isn't competing in pageants.
imdb.title: Here Comes Honey Boo Boo
plot: A reality TV show featuring the life of Toddlers and Tiaras competitor Alana, A.K.A. 'Honey Boo Boo', and her overweight family, as they live every day.::GasmaskProductionsBooks

Alana and her mother, June, have been become two of the more familiar Toddlers & Tiaras faces after a 2012 episode showed Alana drinking go-go juice before a competition. The drink, which worked her into a frenzy in front of the cameras, is a combination of Red Bull and Mountain Dew and had the pair working the talk show circuit earlier in the year to defend their caffeine consumption. Nicknamed Honey Boo Boo, Alana and her family, mother June, dad Sugar Bear and sisters Lauryn, Jessica and Anna, will be the focus of the series when the youngest daughter isn't competing in pageants.::TLC
